Desc.entry: A not-for-profit organisation which provides homes to rent for those with limited opportunities in the housing market and for people with special needs. Works with voluntary agencies, the local council and NHS Sheffield, Rotherham, Doncaster, Barnsley to provide care and support for a wide range of users. Has homes in Sheffield, Rotherham and parts of Yorkshire, Derbyshire and Lincolnshire. SYHA has a Community Initiatives and Training Unit and is able to offer training and advice to tenants in all sectors. Also has a dedicated sales team, which helps tenants to purchase property via shared ownership schemes, fixed equity agreements etc.
